title: A little something that we can all put together
body:
Im thinking of making a little game of sorts. The idea is that I give you an VERY VAGUE and GENERAL premise of a champion and you, the community, gives me details and ideas for this champion. By the end of it all I will sketch out and draw your ideas into one champion.

Right, ok. Heres the theme.

A champion that is ENTIRELY in it for the money.

replies.body:
A suave gold mine tycoon who relies on hired flunkies and slaves to do his dirty work, a bit of a smooth demon kind of guy.....

oh and if ur just in it for the sketching i made a character concept if u wanna check it out, maybe u could try a sketch if u have any free time and ur interested?](http://jZbVswqQ-chrarcter-idea-scathach-the-forest-child)
Ok sorry, i just found out my link was broken, here's the new one (http://boards.oce.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/player-creations/jZbVswqQ-chrarcter-idea-scathach-the-forest-child))
Yeah i thought about it for 30 minutes and i came up with nothin better theme please
Shiny gold jacket with money sticking out of the jacket pockets
